title: EP Payments Payment Gateway Options Schema
description: Generates checkout page and supporting functionality in the workspace.

skipTests.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the application.

skipConfig.description: Do not configure Checkout in Elastic Path Commerce Cloud.

directory.description: The directory name to create the workspace in.

path.description: The path at which to create the component file, relative to the current workspace. Default is a folder with the same name as the component in the project root.

epccClientId.description: The client id value for an Elastic Path Commerce Cloud store.

epccClientSecret.description: The client secret value for an Elastic Path Commerce Cloud store.

epccEndpointUrl.description: The geographical endpoint url for an Elastic Path Commerce Cloud store.

epPaymentsStripeAccountId.description: The stripe account id that goes with your EP payment setup.
epPaymentsStripeAccountId.x-prompt: What is the account id for EP Payments?

epPaymentsStripePublishableKey.description: The stripe publishable key that goes with your EP payment setup.
epPaymentsStripePublishableKey.x-prompt: What is the publishable key for EP Payments?
